briefTitle: A Study of an Antibiotic Implant in General Surgical Subjects at Higher Risk for Surgical Wound Infection
officialTitle: A Randomized, Controlled, Phase 3 Study of Gentamicin-Collagen Sponge in General Surgical Subjects at Higher Risk for Surgical Wound Infection
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the gentamicin-collagen sponge is safe and effective for preventing surgical wound infections in patients undergoing colorectal surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Surgical Wound Infections From Surgery Through Post-operative Day 60
